title: Wild Magic
description: Gravely injured in an ambush that only she survived, Jana thought she was going to die. But fate had other plans, and Jana was saved- brought in from the snow and certain death by a dark and mysterious stranger. Jana is grateful to be alive, but who is this secretive woman and what does she want with Jana?Wild Magic is an intense romantic short story in the Lovers of the Unbound Kingdoms universe.
author: Sharon F. Kay
